kv4.1:5.8: Hañci natthi arahato gihisaṃyojanaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.1:6.3: Nanu arahato gihisaṃyojanaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti?
kv4.1:6.5: Hañci arahato gihisaṃyojanaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.1:7.3: Atthi koci gihī gihisaṃyojanaṃ appahāya diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaroti?
kv4.1:7.5: Hañci natthi koci gihī gihisaṃyojanaṃ appahāya diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.1:8.4: “atthi nu kho, bho gotama, koci gihī gihisaṃyojanaṃ appahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassantakaro”ti?
kv4.1:8.5: “Natthi kho, vaccha, koci gihī gihisaṃyojanaṃ appahāya kāyassa bhedā dukkhassantakaro”ti.
kv4.1:9.3: Arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyya, ajeḷakaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, cittavaṇḍavālamoḷiṃ dhāreyya, odātāni vatthāni dīghadasāni dhāreyya, yāvajīvaṃ agāriyabhūto assāti?
kv4.1:10.4: Nanu yaso kulaputto, uttiyo gahapati, setu māṇavo, gihibyañjanena arahattaṃ pattoti?
kv4.1:10.6: Hañci yaso kulaputto, uttiyo gahapati, setu māṇavo, gihibyañjanena arahattaṃ patto, tena vata re vattabbe—
